name: tool
description: A detailed and comprehensive description of what the tool does. This description can be multi-sentence and should clearly explain the tool's purpose, its primary function, and what the user can expect as a result.

param1.description: A detailed description for the first parameter. Explain its purpose, any constraints (e.g., must be non-empty, max length of 256 characters), and provide an example if helpful.

param2.description: A detailed description for the second, optional parameter. Explain when it should be used and what its default behavior is if omitted. For example, 'A positive integer for pagination.'.

param3.description: A detailed description for the third parameter. Explain what `True` and `False` values signify. For example, 'If `True` (the default), the operation will be performed recursively. If `False`, it will only affect the top-level item.'.
